notesStmt.note: Verse endings are signified by a sof pasuḳ; standard opened and closed parshiyot are maintained; beginning of weekly reading תזריע signified in the exterior margin with a decorated heading "פרש'"; Fol. 1 contains Leviticus XI 40 בגדיו- XII 7 דמיה. Fol. 2 contains XIII 26 ואם יראנה- ibid. 42 עמק מן; many variants from the standard Masoretic text, most of them appear to be errant.
Condition: torn. dev.; complete, non-consecutive; marginalia.
